title: Gift Guide for the Kiddos: Favorites from Gathre
description: Today, I’m so excited to share a special gift guide featuring some incredible pieces from Gathre that are perfect for the little ones in our lives. As a mom, I know how meaningful it is to find toys and accessories that are not only adorable but also versatile, safe, and long-lasting. I purchased the Block […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: Today, I’m so excited to share a special gift guide featuring some incredible pieces from Gathre that are perfect for the little ones in our lives. As a mom, I know how meaningful it is to find toys and accessories that are not only adorable but also versatile, safe, and long-lasting. I purchased the Block […]
text: Today, I’m so excited to share a special gift guide featuring some incredible pieces from Gathre that are perfect for the little ones in our lives. As a mom, I know how meaningful it is to find toys and accessories that are not only adorable but also versatile, safe, and long-lasting. I purchased the Block Play Set a few years ago, and I am such a big fan of all things Gathre! From play tunnels to tumbling mats, each of these items has been curated to bring both joy and practicality to your kiddos’ spaces. These are great gifts for indoor play during the winter, but we have also brought these outside in the summer—just a great way to get some energy out. And some of these products come with a Peter Rabbit Print, so you know I am obsessed. I’ve gathered a list of items that will help create a cozy, imaginative environment that’s both functional and fun.Play TunnelKids love crawling through spaces and playing peek-a-boo, and this Play Tunnel is such a lovely addition to their playtime setup. It’s soft, easy to move around, and adds just the right amount of adventure to your living room or play area. Plus, the neutral colors make it easy to blend into your existing decor.Padded MiniThis Padded Mini is a sweet little spot for your kiddo to relax—whether they’re reading, watching a show, or simply taking a rest after a busy play session. It’s soft, portable, and the perfect size for your little one to cozy up on. I love that it’s simple enough to move from room to room depending on where you need a comfy spot.Floor CushionYou all know I love cozy spots throughout the home, and the Floor Cushion is one of those versatile pieces that work for both kiddos and adults! Whether used for a reading nook, for floor play, or as an extra cushion for family movie night, this one is going to be a favorite for sure.Soft Play CubesThese Soft Play Cubes are great for stacking, building, and imagining. I’m always a fan of toys that grow with the child, and these cubes are perfect for open-ended play—whether it’s a castle, an obstacle course, or just learning about shapes and colors.Block PlaysetThe Block Playset is a dream for any little builder in your life. These simple blocks encourage creativity, motor skills, and problem-solving. I love watching little ones create towers and see them light up with joy as they knock them down, only to build again.Play TentThis Play Tent is one of my favorites on this list because it provides a beautiful little hideaway. It’s the perfect spot for your kiddo to cozy up with some stuffed animals, enjoy a picnic, or let their imaginations run wild—plus, it’s such a darling addition to any playroom.Play TheatreFor your budding performer, the Play Theatre is an amazing gift. It encourages storytelling, imagination, and creativity—plus, you get the added benefit of adorable plays performed right at home! This is one of those pieces that bring memories to life and make family time even more special.Tumbling Mats & Balance BeamKeeping kids active, especially in those colder months when we’re indoors, is key! The Tumbling Mats and Balance Beam are ideal for creating an at-home gym—they let your little ones get their energy out, practice balance, and even learn a few basic gymnastic skills in a safe environment. Plus, they’re made from easy-to-clean materials, which is always a plus.Play Gym Slide & Play GymThe Play Gym Slide and Play Gym are perfect for those active little climbers. These are great for indoor adventures, giving your kiddos a chance to explore and move—rain or shine. I love that they’re easy to add to any play space without taking up too much room and still provide so much fun.LoungerLast but not least, the Lounger is such a wonderful spot for little ones to rest, relax, or simply enjoy some quiet time. Whether for reading books or snuggling up with a favorite blanket, this lounger adds comfort and style to any room.I hope this guide helps spark some inspiration for the kiddos in your life—whether it’s your own children, grandkids, nieces, nephews, or any special little ones you’re shopping for. These items are not only practical but also add an element of fun and style to your home. I love how Gathre makes things so thoughtfully—with an eye for quality and aesthetics that fit so perfectly into a cozy home. Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!xxLizMarie
html:
Today, I’m so excited to share a special gift guide featuring some incredible pieces from Gathre that are perfect for the little ones in our lives. As a mom, I know how meaningful it is to find toys and accessories that are not only adorable but also versatile, safe, and long-lasting. I purchased the Block Play Set a few years ago, and I am such a big fan of all things Gathre! From play tunnels to tumbling mats, each of these items has been curated to bring both joy and practicality to your kiddos’ spaces. These are great gifts for indoor play during the winter, but we have also brought these outside in the summer—just a great way to get some energy out. And some of these products come with a Peter Rabbit Print, so you know I am obsessed. I’ve gathered a list of items that will help create a cozy, imaginative environment that’s both functional and fun.

Play Tunnel
Kids love crawling through spaces and playing peek-a-boo, and this Play Tunnel is such a lovely addition to their playtime setup. It’s soft, easy to move around, and adds just the right amount of adventure to your living room or play area. Plus, the neutral colors make it easy to blend into your existing decor.

Padded Mini
This Padded Mini is a sweet little spot for your kiddo to relax—whether they’re reading, watching a show, or simply taking a rest after a busy play session. It’s soft, portable, and the perfect size for your little one to cozy up on. I love that it’s simple enough to move from room to room depending on where you need a comfy spot.

Floor Cushion
You all know I love cozy spots throughout the home, and the Floor Cushion is one of those versatile pieces that work for both kiddos and adults! Whether used for a reading nook, for floor play, or as an extra cushion for family movie night, this one is going to be a favorite for sure.

Soft Play Cubes
These Soft Play Cubes are great for stacking, building, and imagining. I’m always a fan of toys that grow with the child, and these cubes are perfect for open-ended play—whether it’s a castle, an obstacle course, or just learning about shapes and colors.

Block Playset
The Block Playset is a dream for any little builder in your life. These simple blocks encourage creativity, motor skills, and problem-solving. I love watching little ones create towers and see them light up with joy as they knock them down, only to build again.

Play Tent
This Play Tent is one of my favorites on this list because it provides a beautiful little hideaway. It’s the perfect spot for your kiddo to cozy up with some stuffed animals, enjoy a picnic, or let their imaginations run wild—plus, it’s such a darling addition to any playroom.

Play Theatre
For your budding performer, the Play Theatre is an amazing gift. It encourages storytelling, imagination, and creativity—plus, you get the added benefit of adorable plays performed right at home! This is one of those pieces that bring memories to life and make family time even more special.

Tumbling Mats & Balance Beam
Keeping kids active, especially in those colder months when we’re indoors, is key! The Tumbling Mats and Balance Beam are ideal for creating an at-home gym—they let your little ones get their energy out, practice balance, and even learn a few basic gymnastic skills in a safe environment. Plus, they’re made from easy-to-clean materials, which is always a plus.

Play Gym Slide & Play Gym
The Play Gym Slide and Play Gym are perfect for those active little climbers. These are great for indoor adventures, giving your kiddos a chance to explore and move—rain or shine. I love that they’re easy to add to any play space without taking up too much room and still provide so much fun.

Lounger
Last but not least, the Lounger is such a wonderful spot for little ones to rest, relax, or simply enjoy some quiet time. Whether for reading books or snuggling up with a favorite blanket, this lounger adds comfort and style to any room.

I hope this guide helps spark some inspiration for the kiddos in your life—whether it’s your own children, grandkids, nieces, nephews, or any special little ones you’re shopping for. These items are not only practical but also add an element of fun and style to your home. I love how Gathre makes things so thoughtfully—with an eye for quality and aesthetics that fit so perfectly into a cozy home. Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!

xxLizMarie
